FuncDef: The display vrrp6 admin-vrrp6 command displays information about all management Virtual Router Redundancy Protocol for IPv6 (mVRRP6) backup groups.
Examples: VRID State       Interface               Type    Virtual IP
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To view information about all mVRRP6 backup groups, run the display vrrp6 admin-vrrp6 command. The information includes the interface on which an mVRRP6 backup group is configured, ID of an mVRRP6 backup group, and status of the device in an mVRRP6 backup group.
